TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StoryFragment extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.BlockElement>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class StoryFragment Implements IAddChild, IEnumerable(Of BlockElement)
type StoryFragment = class interface IAddChild interface seq<BlockElement> interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 XPS 文档中的整篇文章或其中一部分。

span.span: Represents all or part of a story within an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档中的 XPS 故事大致类似于报纸或杂志中的一篇文章。An XPS story in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document is roughly analogous to a story in a newspaper or magazine. 这是一个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档中的文本和图形内容 (通常在单个主题上) 的一部分。It is a passage of text and graphic content, usually on a single topic, within a single [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 通常情况下, 它跨越多个页面, 但它可以比一页 (如边栏-盒式故事) 更短。Typically, it spans multiple pages, but it can be shorter than a page like a sidebar - boxed story - in a magazine. 故事还可以是不连续的, 如页面4上继续的首页新闻报道。A story can also be discontinuous like a front page newspaper story that is continued on page 4. 因此, 给定页可以有多个情景和多个情景的组成部分。Consequently, a given page can have more than one story and parts of more than one story. 页眉或页脚也是一种特殊的故事, 完全包含在单个页面上。A header or footer is also a special kind of story that is entirely contained on a single page. 表示部分或部分内容。A represents all or a portion of a story. 它永远不会跨越多页, 但它可以占用整个页面或与其他片段共享页面。It can never span more than one page, but it can occupy the whole of a page or share a page with other fragments. 如果某个故事在多页上, 则每个页面上的每个部分都是单独的片段。If a story is on more than one page, each part of it on each page is a separate fragment. 尽管故事可以具有不连续的片段集, 但片段本身也不连续。Although stories can have discontinuous sets of fragments, no fragment can itself be discontinuous. 只有元素可以是的父级。 Only a element can be a parent of a . 中元素的位置指示该情景是否包含在多个片段中,以及在当前片段之前还是之后。The location of the elements within a indicates if the story is contained in multiple fragments, and if the additional fragments either precede or follow the current fragment. `` `` [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]当在某个结构化元素的中间``结束时, 如果为, 则生成文档的应用程序必须在标记前为元素 (在本例中为) 插入相应的结束标记, 甚至尽管该结构将在后面的片段中继续进行。When a ends in the middle of some structural element; say a ``, then [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document-producing applications must insert an appropriate end tag for the element (in this case ``) before the `` tag, even though the structure is being continued in a later fragment. (为确保中的元素树是有效的 XML, 这是必需的。)继续执行情景的片段必须以中断的结构的开始标记开头。(This is necessary to ensure that the element tree within the is valid XML.) The fragment that continues the story must begin with an opening tag for the interrupted structure. 必须以相同的方式处理中断结构的整个树 (有一个例外, 如下所述):必须为中断点之上的每个不匹配的开始标记添加结束标记。The entire tree of interrupted structures must be treated the same way (with one exception, discussed below): End tags must be added for every unmatched start tag above the point of interruption. 当情景中断紧接在标记之后时, 生成的``应用程序必须将空的表单元结构 (``) 插入片段中继续执行部分的相应点。The exception applies when the story interruption comes immediately after a `` tag, then the producing application must insert an empty table cell structure (``) at the corresponding point in the fragment that continues the story. 这是必需的, 以便需要合并给定情景的所有片段的使用应用程序可以使用简单的算法来执行此操作。This is necessary so that consuming applications that need to merge all fragments of a given story can use a simple algorithm to do this. 例如, 假设应用程序要向[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档中添加以下材料:Assume, for example, that an application wanted to add the following material to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document: ``` ``` 如果在 "SomeContent" 后面``的段内某个分页符强制结束, 则该应用程序必须创建 split, 如以下示例中所示:If a page break forces an end to the fragment just after the `` for "SomeContent", the application must create the split as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 读取文档的应用程序可能需要合并此内容。An application that reads the document might need to merge this content. 例如, 请考虑一个 XPS 查看器, 其中包含 "**将整个情景复制到剪贴板**" 按钮;或将故事传递到语音合成器的盲人应用程序的**XPS** 。Consider, for example, an XPS viewer with a **Copy Whole Story to Clipboard** button; or an **XPS for the Blind** application that passed stories to a voice synthesizer. 阅读文档的某些应用程序可能需要合并部分段落。Some applications that read the document may need to merge a subset of the fragments of a story. 例如, 通过三次单击将整个段落复制到剪贴板的一项功能是, 只要段落跨越分页符, 就需要进行合并, 因为这样的段落将在两个之间拆分。For example, a feature that copies a whole paragraph to the clipboard by triple-clicking it would need to do a merge whenever the paragraph spanned a page break, because such a paragraph would be split between two s. **若要合并, 请使用此算法:****To merge use this algorithm:** 1. 删除要合并的第一个片段末尾的, 并``从第二个片段的开头删除。 ``Delete the `` from the end of the first fragment to be merged and delete the `` from the beginning of the second. 2. 如果第一个片段的最后一个结束标记的类型与第二个片段的第一个开始标记 (并且它们不``是标记) 的类型相同, 则将其删除。If the last closing tag of the first fragment is of the same type as the first opening tag of the second fragment (and they are not `` tags), delete them both. 3. 重复步骤 2, 直到两个段处于以下*任一*状态:Repeat step 2 until the two fragments are in *either* of these states: - 在前导片段的最后一个结束标记之间不再有类型匹配尾随片段的第一个开始标记。There is no longer a type match between the last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment. - 前导片段的最后一个结束标记, 尾随片段的第一个开始标记是``标记。The last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment are both `` tags. 在上面的示例中, 如果生成应用程序尚未添加空单元, 则片段的合并将生成一个表, 该表的第一行只有一个单元格, 其中包含 "SomeContent" 和 "MoreContent" 引用而不是原始的第一个具有两个单元格的行, 每个单元格包含一个引用In the example above, if the empty cell had not been added by the producing application, then a merger of the fragments would produce a table whose first row had only one cell containing both the "SomeContent" and "MoreContent" references instead of the original first row with two cells, each containing a single reference 合并整个情景时, 应对同一情景的每个后续片段重复该算法。When the entire story is being merged, the algorithm should be repeated for each subsequent fragment that is part of the same story. 属于某个情景的片段在``元素中编制了索引。The fragments that belong to a story are indexed in the `` element. 请参阅可在 XPS [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]上[获取的规范的9.1.15 部分:规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). 给定情景的最后一个片段将元素作为其最后一个子级。The last fragment for a given story will have a element as its last child. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档的部分。The following example shows the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructStoryFragContent1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage1_structure.xaml#docstructstoryfragcontent1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的值包括 "标头"、"页脚" 和 "内容"。Possible values include "Header," "Footer," and "Content." 有关`FragmentType` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档``部件的属性的详细信息, 请参阅可在[XPS 获取的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范的第9章:规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `FragmentType` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示`FragmentType` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档``部件的属性。The following example shows the `FragmentType` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定情景的所有片段的此属性必须具有相同的值。All fragments of a given story must have the same value for this property. 它必须与``元素`StoryName`的属性匹配。It must match the `StoryName` attribute of the `` element. 请参阅可在 XPS [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]上[获取的规范的9.1.15 部分:规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). 如果为页眉或页脚, 则可以指定此属性。This property can be unspecified if is Header or Footer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`StoryName` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档``部件的属性。The following example shows the `StoryName` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructStoryFragContent1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage1_structure.xaml#docstructstoryfragcontent1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将子对象添加到 中。Adds a child object to the . 必须至少有一个子级, 并且子级只能属于以下类型: 、 、 、 、 和。There must be at least one child of the and the children can only be of these types: , , , , , and . 只能是的第一个或最后一个子级。 A can only be the first or last child of a .
